name: qavajs
description: qavajs test automation framework vscode extension

cucumber.features.markdownDescription:
The `cucumber.features` setting overrides where the extension 
should look for `.feature` files. 

If no feature files are found, [autocomplete](#autocomplete) 
will not work.

Default value:

```json 
{
  "cucumber.features": [
    "features/**/*.feature"
  ]
}
```

cucumber.glue.markdownDescription:
The `cucumber.glue` setting overrides where the extension
should look for source code where step definitions and
parameter types are defined.

If no glue files are found, [autocomplete](#autocomplete) 
will not work, and all Gherkin steps will be underlined as 
undefined. [Generate step definition](#generate-step-definition)
will not work either.

Default value:

```json
 {
  "cucumber.glue": [
    "node_modules/@qavajs/**/src/*.ts",
    "step_definition/*.js",
    "step_definition/*.ts"
  ]
}
```

qavajs.pageObject.markdownDescription:
path to qavajs page object root. 
Default value: "page_object/index.js"

qavajs.memory.markdownDescription:
path to qavajs to memory root. 
Default value: "memory/index.js"

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
